frontmatter.title: Reusable Angular Material Input Autocomplete form control
frontmatter.description: In this example I will use an Angular Material Autocomplete form control and show how to implement @angular/forms ControlValueAccessor interface to build a reusable form control. The form control will display a message (like an option) while it waits for results and a message when no results were found.
